snippet.title: Bub's Puzzle Blast (1920 1080) 2
snippet.description:
Puzzle Blast Bobble Bubble! Free Casual Game
[Bub's Puzzle Blast] reflects the worldview of Bubble Bobble!
The legendary masterpiece, the perfect combination of the nostalgic Bubble Bobble and Puzzle Blast!

Defeat monsters with original characters from the original series.
Use your brain and try to reach the top of the magic tower with colorful bubbles moving in the air.

Destroy monsters and obstacles by popping bubbles of the same color and making Special Bubbles!
Rescue your enchanted friends and join forces to build your own Miniroon Town.

Are you ready to pop bubbles?

🔽🔽🔽
Play Store : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.actgames.bubble
APP store : https://apps.apple.com/us/app/bubs-puzzle-blast/id1585641856

Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/bubspuzzleblast
